title: If That Isnt Love
content:
1 - If That Isnt Love

1
He left the splendor of heaven
Knowing His destiny
Was the lonely hill of Golgotha
There to lay down His life for me

Chorus:
If that isnt love the ocean is dry
Theres no stars in the sky
And the sparrow cant fly;
If that isnt love then heavens a myth
Theres no feeling like this
If that isnt love

2
Even in death He remembered
The thief hanging by His side
He spoke with love and compassion,
Then He promised Him paradise.

title: I Talk To The Lord About It
content:
2 - I Talk To The Lord About It

1
Sometimes my way grows weary
With trials hard to bear
I take my burdens to Jesus
He hears my every prayer

2
I talk to the Lord about it
Yes He is a friend indeed
I talk to the Lord about it
He knows just what I need

3
When life seems dark and dreary
And weighted down with care
Just take you burdens to Jesus
He'll hear your every prayer

4
Just talk to the Lord about it
Yes He is a friend indeed
Just talk to the Lord about it
He know just what you need

title: Ill Never Be Lonely
content:
3 - Ill Never Be Lonely

1
Lonely days and lonely nights, filled with despair
Caused me to long for someone to care;
Then I heard Christ say to me, This promise I've made;
Lo! I am with you now and forever be not afraid

2
I'll never be lonely again, never again,
For I have opened my heart's door to Him;
So I'll brush away the rears and forget my foolish fears
I'll never be lonely again, never again

3
If youre longing for a friend, loving and true,
Turn to the Saviour He waits for you;
He will do the same for you as He did for me,
He'll never leave you, never forsake you, trust Him and see

4
You'll never be lonely again, never again
If you will open your heart's door to Him,
So just brush away the tears and forget your foolish fears
You'll never be lonely again, never again

5
I feel the touch of hands so kind and gentle,
They're leading me in paths that I must trod,
I have no fear when Jesus walks beside me,
For I'm sheltered in the arms of God

title: Sheltered in the Arm Of God
content:
4 - Sheltered in the Arm Of God


Chorus:
So let the storms rage high, the dark clouds rise,
They don't worry me,
For I'm sheltered safe within the arms of God,
He walks with me and naught on earth shall harm me,
For I'm sheltered in the arms of God

1
Soon I shall hear the call from heaven's portals,
Come home, my child, It's the last mile you must trod
I'll fall asleep and wait for God's new heaven,
Sheltered safe within the arms of God.

title: Where No One Stands Alone
content:
5 - Where No One Stands Alone

1
Once I stood in the night with my head bowed low,
In the darkness as black as could be;
And my heart felt alone and cried, O Lord
Don't hide Your face from me

Chorus:
Hold my hand all the way, every hour every day,
From here to the great unknown
Take my hand let me stand
Where no one stands alone

2
Like a king I may live in a palace so tall;
With great riches to call my own;
But I don't know a thing in this whole wide world,
That's worse than being alone

title: I Believe
content:
6 - I Believe

1
I believe (3)
So why should I worry or fret (2)

2
He holds the future in the palm of His hand
He has never failed my yet
I know He is reigning and still has control
So why should I worry or fret

3
I know He holds the future,
And I know He holds my hand:
I know just as sure as I'm singing this song
I'm a part of His almighty plan

4
He told He'd protect me and go with me each day
And brother: I've no reason to doubt;
He's been so near me every step of the way
And He will surely lead His children all out

title: I Found the Lord
content:
7 - I Found the Lord

1
I found happiness
I found peace of mind
I found the joy of living perfect love sublime;
I found real contentment
Happy living in accord
I found happiness all the time
Wonderful peace of mind
When I found the Lord

2
No more lonely days of pain and misery
For the door of happiness I found the key
I have found a life of love and harmony
Wondrous happiness all the time
Harmony so divine
Since I found the Lord

3
I'm so happy with this brand new melody
I have found that life can be a symphony
Looking forward to that happy jubilee
Glorious symphony all the time
Melody so divine
Since I found the Lord

title: How Long Has It Been
content:
8 - How Long Has It Been

1
How long has it been since you talked with the Lord
And told Him your heart's hidden secrets?
How long since you prayed?How long since you stayed
On your knees till the light shone through?
How lone has it been since your mind felt at ease?
How long since your heart knew no burden?
Can you call Him your friend?
How long has it been since you knew that He cared for you?

2
How long has it been since you knelt by your bed,
And prayed to the Lord up in heaven?
How long since you knew that He's answer you,
How lng has it been since you woke with the dawn,
And felt that the day's worth the living?
Can you call Him your Friend?
How long has it been since you knew that He cared for you?

title: I Believe in a Hill Called Mount Calvary
content:
9 - I Believe in a Hill Called Mount Calvary

1
There are things, as we travel this earth's shifting sands,
That transcend all the reason
But the things that matter the most in this world,
They can never be held in our hand

Chorus:
I believe in a hill called mount Calvary,
I believe whatever the cost!
And when time has surrendered and earth is no more
I'll still cling to that old rugged cross

2
I believe that the Christ who was slain on the cross,
Has the power to change lives today;
For He changed me completely a new life is mine
That is why by the cross I will stay

3
I believe that this life, with its great mysteries,
Surely someday will come to an end;
But faith will conquer the darkness and death
And will lead me at last to my Friend

title: Oh, Love of God
content:
10 - Oh, Love of God

1
The love of God is greater far,
It goes beyond the highest star,
And reaches to the lowest hell.
The guilty pair, bowed down with care,
God gave His Son to win,
His erring child He reconciled
And pardoned from his sin

Chorus:
Oh, love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall forevermore endure,
The saints' and angels' song

2
When hoary time shall pass away,
And earthly thrones and kingdoms fall;
When men who here refuse to pray,
On rocks and hills and mountains call;
God's love, so sure, shall still endure,
All measureless and strong;
Redeeming grace to Adam's race
The saints and angels song

3
Could we with ink the ocean fill,
And were the skies of parchment made;
Were ev'ry stalk on earth a quill,
And ev'ry man a scribe a trade
To write the love of God above
Would drain the ocean dry,
Nor could the scroll contain the whole,
Tho' stretched from sky to sky

title: In Times Like This
content:
11 - In Times Like This

1
In times like these you need a
Saviour
In times like these you need an anchor
Be very sure, be very sure
Your anchor holds and grips the solid Rock!

Chorus:
This Rock is Jesus, Yes, He's the One;
This Rock is Jesus, the only One!
Be very sure, be very sure
Your anchor holds and grips the solid Rock!

2
In times like these you need the Bible,
In times like these O be not idle;
Be very sure, be very sure,
Your anchor holds and grips the solid Rock!

3
In times like these I have a
Saviour
,
In times like these I have an anchor;
I'm very sure, I'm very sure
My anchor holds and grips the solid Rock!

title: Jesus Is The Joy Of Living
content:
12 - Jesus Is The Joy Of Living

1
I have found a wondrous Saviour,
Jesus Christ, the soul's delight;
Every blessing of His favour,
Fills my heart with hope so bright

Chorus:
Jesus is the joy of living,
He's the King of life to me;
Unto Him my all I'm giving,
His forevermore to be,
I will do what He commands me,
Anywhere He leads I'll go,
Jesus is the joy of the living,
He's the dearest Friend I know:

2
Heav'nly wisdom He provides me,
Grace to keep my Spirit free;
In His own sweet way He guides me,
When the path I cannot see.

title: The Lily of The Valley
content:
13 - The Lily of The Valley

1
I have found a friend in Jesus,
He's everything to me,
He's the fairest of ten-thousand to my soul;
The Lily of the valley, in Him alone I see,
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.
In sorrow He's my comfort, in trouble He's my stay,
He tells me every care on Him to roll

Chorus:
He's the Lily of the valley,
The bright and morning Star,
He's the fairest of ten-thousand to my soul.

2
He all my griefs has taken and all my sorrows borne,
In temptation He's my strong and mighty tow'r;
I have all for Him forsaken, and all my idols torn
From my heart, and now He keeps me by His pow'r
Tho' all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore
Thro' Jesus I shall safely reach the goal

3
He will never, never leave me, not yet forsake me here
While I live by faith and do His blessed will
A Wall of fire about me, I've nothing now to fear,
With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill
Then sweeping up to glory to see His blessed face,
Where rivers of delight shall ever roll.

title: My Father Watches Over Me
content:
14 - My Father Watches Over Me

1
I trust in God wherever I may be,
Upon the land or on the rolling sea
For, come what may, from day to day,
My heav'nly
Father watches over me.

Chorus:
I trust in God I know He cares for me
On mountain bleak or on the stormy sea;
Tho' billows roll, He keeps my soul,
My heav'nly
Father watches over me

2
He makes the rose an object of His care,
He guides the eagle thro' the pathless air,
And surely He remembers me,
My heav'nly
Father watches over me

3
I trust in God, for, in the lion's den
On battlefield or in the prison pen
Thro' praise or blame, thro' flood or flame,
My heav'nly
Father watches over me

4
The valley may be dark, the shadows deep
But O, the Shepherd guards His lonely sheep
And thru' the gloom He'll lead me home.
My heav'nly
Father watches over me.

title: Bless That Wonderful Name of Jesus
content:
15 - Bless That Wonderful Name of Jesus

1
Bless that wonderful name of Jesus (3)
No other name I know

2
There's power in the name of Jesus (3)
No other name I know

3
There's healing in the name of Jesus (3)
No other name I know

title: God is Love
content:
16 - God is Love

1
God is love and the one who lives in love,
Lives in God and God lives in him (2)
And we have come to know and have believed
The love which God has for us...

title: Peace I Leave With You
content:
17 - Peace I Leave With You

1
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give to you;
Not as the world giveth
I give unto You,
Let not your heart be troubled
Neither let it be afraid
My peace I leave with you

title: Jesus I Just Want to Thank You
content:
18 - Jesus I Just Want to Thank You

1
Jesus we just want to thank You (3)
Thank You for being so good

2
Jesus we just want to thank You (3)
Praise You for being so good

3
God is so good (3)
He's so good to me

4
God answers prayer...

5
He's coming soon...

6
God is so good
He's so good to me

title: If You Know the Lord
content:
19 - If You Know the Lord

1
If you know the Lord you need nobody else,
To see you through the darkest night
You can walk alone, you only need the Lord,
He'll keep you on the road marked Right

2
Take time to pray every day and when you're heading home
He'll show you the way
If you know the Lord you need nobody else
To see the light, His wonderful light

title: Ill Live For Jesus
content:
20 - Ill Live For Jesus

1
Sweet Jesus, Sweet Jesus
What a wonder You are
You are brighter than the morning Star
You are fairer, much fairer
Than the lilies that grow by the wayside
Precious more precious than gold

2
I'll live for Jesus
Day after day, I'll live for Jesus
Then come what may
The Holy Spirit, I will obey
I'll live for Jesus day after day.

title: Teach me Lord to Wait
content:
21 - Teach me Lord to Wait

1
They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength,
They shall mount up with wings like eagles;
They shall run and not be weary,
They shall walk and not faint,
Teach me, Lord, teach me Lord, to wait.

title: Sing and Smile and Pray
content:
22 - Sing and Smile and Pray

1
Sing the clouds away,
Night will turn to day;
If you sing and sing and sing,
You'll sing the clouds away.

2
Smile the clouds away,
Night will turn to day;
If you smile and smile and smile,
You'll smile the clouds away.

3
Pray the clouds away,
Pray and pray and pray;
Night will turn to day,
No matter what they say.

4
Sing and smile and pray,
That's the only way.
If you sing and smile and pray;
You'll drive the clouds away.

title: Learning To Lean
content:
23 - Learning To Lean

1
Learning to lean, learning to lean,
I'm learning to lean on Jesus;
Finding more pow'r than I'd ever dreamed,
I'm learning to lean on Jesus.

2
A joy I can't explain is filling my soul,
Since the day I met Jesus my King;
His blessed Holy Spirit is leading the way,
He is teaching, and I'm learning to lean.

3
There's glorious vict'ry each day now for me,
As I dwell in His peace so serene;
He helps me with each task if only ask,
Ev'ryday now I am learning to lean.

title: Foot-Print of Jesus
content:
24 - Foot-Print of Jesus

1
Foot-prints of Jesus leading the way,
Foot-prints of Jesus by night and by day,
I know if I follow my life will be sweet,
For I am saved, oh yes, by His wounded feet.

2
They led Him to Bethany, that's where He stayed,
Then on the Gethsemane and that's where He prayed,
Then on to Mount Calvary, salvation so sweet,
For I am saved, oh yes, by His wounded feet.

3
Once I was lost, He heard my cry,
I looked to Him for mansions on high,
He lifted my burden and now I can sing,
Glory to God, glory to God, I'm a child of the King.

title: When I Think of the Cross
content:
25 - When I Think of the Cross

1
Long long ago in a faraway place,
Rough rugged timbers were raised to the sky,
There hung a man suspended in space,
And tho' He was blameless they left Him to die.

Chorus:
Just to think of the cross moves me now,
The nails in His hands, His bleeding brow,
Just to think of the cross moves me now,
It should have been me (2)
Instead I am free, I am free...

2
He put an end to my guilt and despair,
Turned bitter hating to sweet peace and love,
Even the men that put Him up there,
Were offered forgiveness and life from above.

title: Ive been Redeemed
content:
26 - Ive been Redeemed

1
I've been redeemed by the blood of the Lamb (3)
Filled with the Holy Ghost I am
All my sins are in the blood
I've been redeemed.

2
And that's not all, There's more beside (3)
I've entered the river and been baptized
All my sins are in the blood, I've been redeemed.

3
I've been redeemed by the love divine,
Glory, glory, Christ is mine,
All to Him I now resign,
I have been redeemed.

4
And that's not all, There's more beside (3)
I've entered the river and been baptized
All my sins are in the blood, I've been redeemed.

title: Joy in the Camp
content:
27 - Joy in the Camp

1
For years I travelled down a long and lonely road,
Sorrow and pain my lot to bear,
And then I met the Christ who took my heavy load,
And since then I've heard singing in the air.

Chorus:
There's joy in the camp, a sinner has come home,
There's joy in the camp, rejoicing round the throne,
Singing and shouting the great redemption song,
There's joy, wondrous joy in the camp.

2
The angels in heaven are rejoicing round the throne,
Filling the lofts with chords so grand,
They're singing because of one lost sheep who just came home,
I know there must be joy in the camp.

title: I Am Bound For The Promised Land
content:
28 - I Am Bound For The Promised Land

1
On Jordan's stormy banks I stand and cast a wishful eye,
To Canaan's fair and happy land where my possessions lie.

Chorus:
I am bound for the promised land (3)
Oh who will come and go with me
I am bound for the promised land.

2
O'er all those wide extended plains shines one eternal day,
There Christ, the Sun forever reigns and scatters night away

3
No chilling winds nor poisonous breath can reach that healthful shore,
Sickness and sorrow, pain and death are felt and feared no more,
When shall I reach that happy place and be forever blest,
When shall I see my Father's face and in His kingdom rest?

title: We Will Understand It Better
content:
29 - We Will Understand It Better

1
Trials dark on every hand and we cannot understand
All the ways that God will lead us to the blessed promised land,
But He'll guide us with His eye and we'll follow till we die,
We will understand it better by and by

Chorus:
By and by when the morning comes
When the saints of God are gathered home,
We will tell the story how we've overcome
We will understand it better by and by

2
Temptations, hidden snares, often take us unawares,
And our heart are made to bleed for some thoughtless word or deed,
And we wonder why the test when we try to do our best
We will understand it better by and by

title: Over The Sunset Mountain
content:
30 - Over The Sunset Mountain

3 1
Over the sunset mountains someday I'll softly go;
Into the arms of Jesus He who has loved me so.

Chorus:
Over the sunset mountains, Heaven awaits for me;
Over the sunset mountains, Jesus my
Saviour
I'll see.

2
Toiling will all be ended, Shadows will flee away;
Sorrow will be forgotten, O what a wonderful day!

title: Even So, Lord Jesus Come
content:
31 - Even So, Lord Jesus Come

1
In a world of fear and turmoil,
In a race that seems so hard to run,
Lord I need Thy rich in-filling,
Even so, Lord Jesus, come

Chorus:
Even so, Lord Jesus come
My heart doth long for Thee
Though I've failed and betrayed Thy trust
Even so, Lord Jesus come.

2
When my eyes, shall span the river,
When I gaze into the vast unknown,
May I say with calm assurance,
Even now, Lord Jesus, come

title: The Church in the Wildwood
content:
32 - The Church in the Wildwood

1
There's a church in the valley by the wildwood,
No lovelier spot in the dale;
No place is so dear to my childhood
As the little brown church in the vale.

Chorus:
Come to the church in the wildwood,
Oh, come to the church in the vale,
No spot is so dear to my childhood,
As the little brown church in the vale.

2
Oh, come to the church in the wildwood,
To the trees where the wild flowers bloom;
Where the parting hymn will be chanted,
We will weep by the side of the tomb.

3
How sweet on a clear Sabbath morning,
To list to the clear ringing bell:
Its tones so sweetly are calling
Oh,come to the church in the vale.

4
From the church in the valley by the wildwood,
When day fades away into night,
I would fain from this spot of my child wood
Wing my way to the mansions of light.

title: Beyond the Sunset
content:
33 - Beyond the Sunset

1
Beyond, the sunset, O blissful morning,
When with our
Saviour heav'n is begun;
Earth's toiling ended, O glorious dawning,
Beyond the sunset, when day is done.

2
Beyond the sunset , no clouds will gather,
No storms will threaten, no fears annoy;
O day of gladness, O day unending,
Beyond the sunset, eternal joy!

3
Beyond the sunset a hand will guide me
To God the Father, whom I adore;
His glorious presence, His words of welcome,
Will be my portion on that fair share.

4
Beyond the sunset, O glad reunion,
With our dear loved ones who've gone before;
In that fair homeland we'll know no parting,
Beyond the sunset forevermore!

title: Send the Light
content:
34 - Send the Light

1
There's a call ringing o'er the restless wave,
Send the light!... Send the light!
There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save,
Send the light!... Send the light!

Chorus:
Send the light!... The blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light!... The blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore

2
We have heard the Macedonian call today,
Send the light!... Send the light!
And a golden off'ring at the cross we lay,
Send the light!... Send the light!

3
Let us pray grace my eve'rywhere abound!
Send the light!... Send the light!
And
Christlike spirit eve'rywhere be found
Send the light!... Send the light!

4
Let us not grow weary in the work of love,
Send the light!... Send the light!
Let us gather jewels for a crown above
Send the light!... Send the light!

title: The Youth of The World
content:
35 - The Youth of The World

1
We have heard Thy call, Lord Jesus,
And our hearts respond with joy;
We will pledge Thee our allegiance,
For Thy cause our all employ

Chorus:
The youth of the world for the Man of Galilee
The youth of the world from all sin and self set free!

2
Ev'ry talent pledged in service
Now and through eternity.
The youth of the world for the Man of Galilee!

3
Ev'ry talent Thou hast given
Nor for hiding, but for use;
All our time is of Thy lending
To be spent as Thou shalt
?????

4
Whatsoe'er we are or have, Lord
Shall be subject to Thy will
Trust us with Thy greatest ??????
Lord, and with joy our hearts shall thrill

title: Spirit of God
content:
36 - Spirit of God

1
Spirit of God in the clear running water,
Blowing to greatness the tree on the hill,
Spirit of God in the finger of morning,
Fill the earth, bring it to birth
And blow where You will

Chorus:
Blow, blow,blow till I be
But breath of the Spirit blow in me

2
Down in the meadow the willow are moaning,
Sheep in the pastureland cannot lie still;
Spirit of God, creation is groning
Fill the earth, bring it to birth
And blow where You will

3
I saw the scar of a year that lay dying
Heard the lament of a lone whip poor-will
Spirit of God, see that cloud crying
Fill the earth, bring it to birth
And blow where You will

4
Spirit of God, ev'ry man's heart is lonely,
Watching and waiting and hungry until-
Spirit of God, man longs that You only,
Fulfill the earth, bring it to birth
And blow where You will

title: Where Well Never Grow Old
content:
37 - Where Well Never Grow Old

1
I have heard of a land on the faraway strand,'Tis a beautiful home of the soul
Built by Jesus on high, there we never shall die'Tis a land where we never grow old

Chorus:
Never grow old, never grow old
In a land where we'll never grow old

2
In that beautiful home where we'll never-more roam.
We shall be in the sweet by and by
Happy praise to the King thro' eternity sing.'Tis a land where we never shall die

3
When our work here is done and the life-crown is won,
And our troubles and trials are oer
And our sorrow will end and our voices will blend,
With the loved ones who've gone on before.

title: His Name is
content:
38 - His Name is

WOnderful

1
His name is Wonderful (3)
Jesus my Lord
He is the mighty King, Master of everything
His name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord
He's the great Shepherd, the Rock of all ages,
Almighty God is He;
Bow down before Him, love and adore Him
His name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord

title: Evening & Morning
content:
39 - Evening & Morning

1
Evening and morning and noon will I pray
And cry aloud, and He will hear my voice
He has delivered my soul in peace
From the battle that was against me
As for me, I will call on God
And the Lord will save me (2)

title: New Life in Christ
content:
40 - New Life in Christ

1
New life in Christ, abundant and free,
What glories shine, what joys are mine,
What wondrous blessings I see;
My past with its sin, the searching and strife
Forever gone, there's a bright new morn
For in Christ I have found new life.

title: Youve got to Love Everybody
content:
41 - Youve got to Love Everybody

1
You've got to love everybody if you want to see Jesus (God) (2)
You needn't mind about the way of others
You've got to treat all men like brothers
You've got to love everybody...

2
Shake hands... Sympathize

title: Your Joy May be Full
content:
42 - Your Joy May be Full

1
This is My commandment,
That ye love one another
That your joy may be full

2
That your joy may be full
That your joy may be full... (John 15:11,12)

title: No Condemnation
content:
43 - No Condemnation

1
There is therefore now no condemnation
To them which are in Christ Jesus,
There is therefore now no condemnation
To them which are in Christ Jesus,
There is therefore now no condemnation
To them which are in Christ Jesus,
Who walk not after the flesh but after the Spirit
Romans 8:1

title: The Steps of a Good Man
content:
44 - The Steps of a Good Man


The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD:
And he delighteth in his way.
Though he fall, Though he fall, he shall not be cast down:
For the LORD upholdeth him with
His hand.
With His hand, with His hand
For the LORD upholdeth him with
His hand.
Though he fall, Though he fall, he shall not be cast down:
For the LORD upholdeth him with
His hand.
Psa
37:23-24 KJV

title: Deep, Deep, Deep as the Sea
content:
45 - Deep, Deep, Deep as the Sea

1
Deep, deep, deep as the sea,
High, high, high as the sky,
Wide, wide, wide as the ocean blue,
Is Jesus' love for you and me
It's just as deep, deep, deep as the sea,
High, high, high as the sky,
Wide, wide, wide as the ocean blue,
Is Jesus' love for you

title: Every Moment of Everyday
content:
46 - Every Moment of Everyday

1
Only to be what He wants me to be,
Ev'ry moment of ev'ry day;
Yielded completely to Jesus alone,
Ev'ry step of this pilgrim way;
Just to be clay in the Potter's hands,
Ready to do what His word commands,
Only to be what He wants me to be,
Ev'ry moment of ev'ry day.

title: Every Day With Jesus
content:
47 - Every Day With Jesus

1
Ev'ry day with Jesus, is sweeter than the day before,
Ev'ry day with Jesus, I love Him more and more;
Jesus saves and keeps me, and He's the one I'm waiting for;
Ev'ry day with Jesus, is sweeter than the day before

title: Ill Be True, Precious Jesus
content:
48 - Ill Be True, Precious Jesus

1
I'll be true precious Jesus, I'll be true
I'll be true precious Jesus, I'll be true

Chorus:
There's a race to be run,
There's a vict'ry to be won ev'ry hour,
By Thy power I'll be true

title: The Beauty of Jesus
content:
49 - The Beauty of Jesus

1
Let the beauty of Jesus be seen in me,
All His wonderful passion and purity;
Oh, Thou Spirit divine, all my nature refine,
Till the beauty of Jesus be seen in me

title: The Law Of The Lord is Perfect
content:
50 - The Law Of The Lord is Perfect


The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul:
The testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
More to be desired are they than gold, yea, much fine gold:
Sweeter also than the honey and the honeycomb.

The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart:
The commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever:
The judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
Psa
19:7-10 KJV

title: We Have Come Into His House
content:
51 - We Have Come Into His House

1
We have come into House
And gathered in His name to worship Him
We have come into House
And gathered in His name to worship Him
We have come into House
And gathered in His name to worship
Chrit
, the Lord,
Worship Him Christ, the Lord

2
So forget about yourself

title: This is My Commandment
content:
52 - This is My Commandment

1
This is My commandment,
That ye love one another
That your joy may be full

2
That your joy may be full
That your joy may be full... (John 15:11,12)

title: May The Good Lord Bless and Keep You
content:
53 - May The Good Lord Bless and Keep You

1
May the good Lord bless and keep you,
Whether near or far away
May you find that long awaiting golden day today
May your troubles all be small ones,
And your fortunes ten times still
May the good Lord bless and keep you
Till we meet again

2
May you walk in sunlight shining,
And the blue bird in every tree
May you find a silver lining,
Back in every cloud you see
Fill your dreams with sweet tomorrow,
Never mind what might have been
May the good Lord bless and keep you
Till we meet again

title: On the Wings of a Snow White Dove
content:
54 - On the Wings of a Snow White Dove

1
When Noah had drifted
On the flood many days
He searched for land in various ways
Troubles he had some
But he wasn't forgotten
God sent down His love
On the wings of a dove

Chorus:
On the wings of a snow white dove
God sent His pure sweet love
Just a sign from above
On the wings of a dove

2
When troubles surround You
And evil may come
Your body grows weak
And your spirit grows numb
When these things beset you
God will not forget you
He'll send down His love
On the wings of a dove

title: Never, Never, Never
content:
55 - Never, Never, Never

1
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy, happy, happy in my life
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy in my life before
He took away my sadness and He filled my heart with gladness
And He gave me all that heaven could afford
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy, happy, happy in my life

2
You are the words of my music
You are the song that I sing
You are the melody
You are the harmony
Praises to Your name I will bring
You are the God of gods
You are the Lord of all
You are the King of all kings
Now I return to You
The song You gave to me
You are the song that I sing

3
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy, happy, happy in my life
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy in my life before
He took away my sadness and He filled my heart with gladness
And He gave me all that heaven could afford
Never, never, never have I ever, ever, ever
Been so happy, happy, happy in my life

title: In Moment Like These
content:
56 - In Moment Like These

1
In moments like these
I sing out a song,
I sing out a love song to Jesus
In moments like these
I lift up my voice
I lift up my voice to the Lord

2
Singing, I love You Lord (3)
I love You.

title: Come, Holy Spirit, I Need Thee
content:
57 - Come, Holy Spirit, I Need Thee

1
Come as a wisdom to children
Come as new sight to the blind
Come, Lord, as strength to my weekness
Take my soul, body and mind

2
Come, Holy Spirit, I need Thee
Come sweet Spirit, I pray
Come in Thy strength and Thy power
Come in Thy own gentle way

3
Come as a rest to the weary
Come as a balm for the sore
Come as a dew to my dryness
Fill me with joy evermore

4
Come like a spring in the desert
Come to the withered of soul
O let Thy sweet healing power
Touch me and make me whole

title: I Love the Thrill
content:
58 - I Love the Thrill

1
I love the thrill that I feel when
I get together with
God's wonderful people
What a sight just to see
All the happy faces
Praising God in heavenly places
What a thrill that I feel when I
Get together with
God's wonderful people

2
O what a joy His love affords
When we meet in one accord
And we life our hearts
In praise unto the Lord
There is no place I'd rather be
Than with the one who's been set free
I'm so glad I'm in God's great big family.

3
I love the thrill that I feel when
I get together with
God's wonderful people
What a sight just to see
All the happy faces
Praising God in heavenly places
What a thrill that I feel when I
Get together with
God's wonderful people

4
Now it can be just anywhere
Two or three are gathered there
That the Spirit of the Lord will be there too
There's no thrill that can compete
With the thrill I feel whenever
God's children meet

5
I love the thrill that I feel when
I get together with
God's wonderful people
What a sight just to see
All the happy faces
Praising God in heavenly places
What a thrill that I feel when I
Get together with
God's wonderful people

6
And on that great reunion day
When our Lord says come away
And the saints from every land
Stream thru' the gates
Joining loved ones round the throne
At last we'll all be gathered home,
That will be the greatest thrill
We've ever known

7
I love the thrill that I feel when
I get together with
God's wonderful people
What a sight just to see
All the happy faces
Praising God in heavenly places
What a thrill that I feel when I
Get together with
God's wonderful people

title: Standing in the Need of Prayer
content:
59 - Standing in the Need of Prayer

1
Not my brother, not my sister
But it's me O Lord
Standing in the need of prayer
(x2)

Chorus:
It's me, It's me O Lord
Standing in the need of prayer
It's me, It's me O Lord
Standing in the need of prayer

2
Not the preacher nor the teacher
But it's me O Lord...
Standing in the need of prayer
(x2)

3
Not the deacon nor the elder
But it's me O Lord...
Standing in the need of prayer
(x2)

title: The Lord of Sea and Sky
content:
60 - The Lord of Sea and Sky

1
I the Lord of sea and sky
I have my people cry
All who dwell in deepest sin
My hand will save
I who made the stars of night
I will make their darkness bright
Who will bear my light to them?
Whom shall I send?

Chorus:
Here I am, Lord. Is it I Lord?
I have heard You calling in the night
I will go Lord, If You lead me
I will hold Your people in my heart

2
I the Lord of snow and rain,
I have borne My people's pain
I have wept for love of them
They turn away.
I will break their hearts of stone
Give them hearts for love alone
I will speak My word to them
Whom shall I send?

3
I the Lord of wind and flame,
I will tend the poor and lame,
I will set a feast for them
My hand will save.
Finest bread I will provide
Till their hearts be satisfied.
I will give My life to them
Whom shall I send?

title: My Jesus, My
content:
61 - My Jesus, My

Saviour

1
My Jesus, my
Saviour
Lord there is none like You
All of my days
I want to praise
The wonders of Your mighty love
My Comfort My Shelter
Tower of refuge and strength
Let every breath
All that I am
Never cease to worship You

2
Shout to the Lord
All the earth
Let us sing
Power and majesty
Praise to the King
Mountains bow down
And the seas will roar
At the sound of Your name
I sing for joy at the works of Your hands
Forever I'll love you forever I'll stand
Nothing compares to the promise I have
In You.

title: We Take A Little Friendship
content:
62 - We Take A Little Friendship

1
We take a little friendship wherever we go
And we make a little friendship wherever you go
And we find that friendship brings us friend-ship wherever we go

2
So we add some acceptance wherever we go
And were glad for acceptance wherever we go
And we find acceptance brings acceptance wherever we go

3
Then we're bound in belonging wherever we go
And we're bound in belonging wherever we go
And we know that we belong together wherever we go

4
Yes, we belong together, we belong together
Belong to each other, and we share a common love
Wherever we go and we care about our love wherever we go
So just take some friend-ship, add acceptance
Belonging will come, and you'll find your love fulfilled
Wherever we go.

title: Theres A Quiet Understanding
content:
63 - Theres A Quiet Understanding

1
There's a quiet understanding
When we're gathered in the Spirit
It's the promise that He gives us
When we gather in His name
There's a love we feel in Jesus
There's a manna that He feeds us
It's a promise that He gives us,
When we gather in His name.

2
And we know when we're together
Sharing love and understanding
That our brothers and our sisters
Feel the oneness that He brings
Thank You Thank You Thank You Jesus
For the way You love and feed us
For the many ways you lead us
Thank You Thank You Lord

3
When we leave this Sanctuary
And we're parted from each other
Keep us tied in that same Spirit
That we feel within us now
For in Jesus there's no distance
No restrictions to His presence
All are one in His own Spirit
Everywhere that we may be
Now and all our lives
Thank You Thank You Lord

title: Abba Father
content:
64 - Abba Father

1
Abba Father, Let it be,
Yours and Yours alone,
May me will forever be,
Ever all Your own.
Never let me roam.
Abba Father, Let me be,
Yours and Yours alone.

title: Create in Me A Clean Heart
content:
65 - Create in Me A Clean Heart

1
Create in me a clean heart, O God,
And renew a right spirit within me (2)
Cast me not away from Thy presence, O Lord
And take not Thy Holy Spirit from me
Restore unto me
The joy of Thy salvation
And renew a right spirit within me.

title: Above All
content:
66 - Above All

1
Above all powers above all kings,
Above all nature and all created things,
Above all wisdom and all the ways of man,
You were here before the world began.

2
Above all kingdoms above all thrones
Above all wonders the world has ever known
Above all wealth and treasures of the earth
There's no way to measure what You're worth

Chorus:
Crucified laid behind a stone
You lived to die rejected and alone
Like a rose trampled on the ground
You took the fall and thought of me
Above all

title: Purify My Heart
content:
67 - Purify My Heart

1
Purify my heart
Let me as gold
And a precious silver
Purify my heart
Let me be as gold, pure gold

2
Refiner's fire
My heart's one desire
Is to be holy
Set apart for you Lord
I choose to be holy
Set apart for You my Master
Ready to do Your will

3
Purify my heart
Cleanse me from within
And make me holy
Purify my heart
Cleanse me from my sin
Deep within.

title: Hide me in The Shelter
content:
68 - Hide me in The Shelter

1
Under the shadow of Your wind,
Here in the secret place of Your holiness,
I will wait on You, O Lord
My God and King
Here in the Holiest of all,
You draw near with love
To abandon all
For the sake of knowing You,
My God and my King.

2
Hide me in the shelter of Your love,
Deep in the center of Your heart,
My Lord
How I want to know You more
And keep me in the shadow of Your wings
Safe in the secret place of Holiness
How I need You more and more.

title: O Ancient of Days
content:
69 - O Ancient of Days

1
Blessing and honour
, Glory and power
Be unto the ancient of days.
From every nation,all of creation
Bow before the ancient of days.

2
Every tongue in heaven and earth
Shall declare your Glory
Every knee shall bow
At your throne in worship
You'll be exalted O Lord and Your kingdom shall not pass away.
O ancient of days

3
Your kingdom shall reign over all the earth
Sing unto the ancient of days
For none can compare
With your matchless worth
Bow before the Ancient of Days

title: Sing and Smile and Pray
content:
70 - Sing and Smile and Pray

7 1
Sing the clouds away,
Night will turn to day;
If you sing and sing and sing,
You'll sing the clouds away.

2
Smile the clouds away,
Night will turn to day;
If you smile and smile and smile,
You'll smile the clouds away.

3
Pray the clouds away,
Pray and pray and pray;
Night will turn to day,
No matter what they say.

4
Sing and smile and pray,
That's the only way.
If you sing and smile and pray;
You'll drive the clouds away.

title: Send The Light
content:
71 - Send The Light

1
There's a call ringing o'er the restless wave,
Send the light!... Send the light!
There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save,
Send the light!... Send the light!

Chorus:
Send the light!... The blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light!... The blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore

2
We have heard the Macedonian call today,
Send the light!... Send the light!
And a golden off'ring at the cross we lay,
Send the light!... Send the light!

3
Let us pray grace my eve'rywhere abound!
Send the light!... Send the light!
And
Christlike spirit eve'rywhere be found
Send the light!... Send the light!

4
Let us not grow weary in the work of love,
Send the light!... Send the light!
Let us gather jewels for a crown above
Send the light!... Send the light!

title: Alive, Alert, Awake
content:
73 - Alive, Alert, Awake

1
I'm alive, alert, awake, enthusiastic (2)
I'm alive, alert, awake
And awake, alert, alive
And alive, alert, awake, enthusiastic

title: I Will Sing of the Mercies
content:
74 - I Will Sing of the Mercies

1
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing, I will sing
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord

2
With my mouth,
Will I make I known
Thy faithfulness, Thy faithfulness
With my mouth
With I make known
Thy faithfulness
Thru' all generations

title: I will Sing Unto the Lord
content:
75 - I will Sing Unto the Lord

1
I will sing unto the Lord
For He has triumphed gloriously!
The horse and its rider
He has thrown into the sea!

title: Behold
content:
76 - Behold

1
Behold, behold
I stand at the door and knock
Behold, behold
I stand at the door and
Knock, knock, knock
If any girls hear my voice
If any boys hear my voice and will open, open, open the door
I will come in

title: For God so Love the World
content:
77 - For God so Love the World

1
For God so loved the world
That He gave his only begotten Son
That whosoever would believe in Him should not perish but have everlasting life

title: I will Make You a Fishers of Man
content:
78 - I will Make You a Fishers of Man

1
I will make you fishers of man
Fishers of man; fishers of man
I will make you fishers of man
If you follow me (3)
I will make you fishers of man
If you follow me

title: Friends Around me
content:
79 - Friends Around me

1
Friends around me are saying,
Earn your money while you can
Doesn't matter how you do it,
Only be a wealthy man

Chorus:
But I don't know, If this is so,
Won't somebody show me,
The way to go (2)
Friends around me are saying,
Use your freedom while you're young,
Doesn't matter how you use it,
You'll be a happy man all day

2
Christ the
Saviour now is saying,
I'm the only Way
It does matter how you live your life,
You'll be a happy man all the day

title: By the Power of Your Love
content:
80 - By the Power of Your Love

1
Lord, I come to You
Let my heart be changed, renewed,
Flowing from the grace,
That I've found in You

2
Lord I've come to know
The weaknesses I see in me,
Will be swept away
By the power of Your love

3
Hold me close, let Your love surround me,
Bring me near, draw me to Your side
And as I wait,
I'll rise up like the eagles,
And I will soar with You
Your Spirit leads me on
In the power of Your love
`

title: No Eye Has Seen
content:
81 - No Eye Has Seen

1
No eye has seen, No ear has heard
No mind has conceived
What the Lord has prepared
But by His Spirit, He has revealed,
His plan to those who lone Him

2
We've been held by His everlasting love
Led with loving kindness by His hand
We have hope for the future yet to come
In time we'll understand
The mystery of His plan... OOO
`

title: To Do Thy Will
content:
82 - To Do Thy Will

1
O gracious God, on Thee I wait,
With thine own self my being fill;
As day by day me life I live,
To do Thy will the blessed will

Chorus:
To do Thy will, yes, that is all;
To do Thy will, obey Thy call;
To follow, Lord, where Thou dost lead,
To do Thy will as all I need

2
In trials oft myself
With soul oppress'd and body ill;
There is a place where peace is found,
Tis is Thy will, Thy holy will

3
And when the glimpse of glory comes,
That gives my soul a happy thrill,
My soul shall answer with delight,
I love, dear Lord, to do Thy will

title: Teach Me Thy Way, O Lord
content:
83 - Teach Me Thy Way, O Lord

1
Teach me Thy way, O Lord
Teach me Thy way!
Thy guiding grace afford-
Teach me Thy way!
Help me to walk aright,
More by faith, less by sight;
Lead me with heav'nly light
Teach me Thy way!

2
When I am sad at heart,
Teach me Thy will!
When earthly joys depart,
Teach me Thy way!
In hour of loneliness,
In times of dire distress,
In failure of success,
Teach me Thy way!

3
When doubts and fears arise,
Teach me Thy way!
When storms o'er spread the skies,
Teach me Thy way!
Shine though the cloud and rain,
Thru sorrow, toil and pain;
Make Thou my pathway plain
Teach me Thy way!
